result.title: this hotel is located in the center of the city and offers exclusive services

On the upper floors the view is over the whole city

result.pros: The hotel room was excellent. The SPA center was good, but there was no swimming pool. In that kind of hotel, one would expect to have a swimming pool...Otherwise, everything else was just perfect including the location, room service, parking, facilities, and staff were very welcoming.

result.title: Very good
result.pros: Room is spacious and comfortable with nice views. Central location is very convenient. Airport transfer by hotel is good priced (around 20EUR) and payable at the reception which is great.

result.cons: Hotel is rather new, but already some signs of use, especially in the room. Towels should be of higher quality. Small details lack attention in bathroom, wardrobe, etc.

result.pros: Loved the people
result.title: Exceptional

result.pros:
I had an absolutely fantastic experience at Hotel Plaza in the heart of Tirana. The location is ideal, right in the center, providing easy access to key attractions. The hotel itself offers the epitome of luxury, boasting all the comforts one would expect from a 5-star establishment. The rooms are beautifully appointed, spacious, and well-maintained.

The staff at Hotel Plaza were exceptional—attentive, courteous, and always ready to assist. The level of service truly exceeded my expectations. The on-site amenities, from the fine dining options to the spa facilities, contributed to a truly indulgent stay.

I would highly recommend Hotel Plaza to anyone seeking a top-notch accommodation experience in Tirana. It's not just a place to stay; it's a destination in itself, providing a perfect blend of convenience, opulence, and hospitality

result.cons: One issue was, the AC could have worked more efficiently, or better, 25C in the room and tough to cool down is not that ideal, the rest, no complaints.
result.pros: The breakfast was excellent, had all you need, from juice, to coffee, cereal, meat, veggies, fruit, bread and enough space to sit, talk and friendly staff. The rooms are really nice, enough space, if you bring a partner, 2 in the bath maybe not so idea, one chair in the room, the rest, good comfy bed, nice view from the higher level rooms, the sky bar is amazing :)
